snippet: A mistake by the payroll center that serves 23 federal agencies meant that paychecks were not deposited into bank accounts on Friday as they usually are.
abstract: A mistake by the payroll center that serves 23 federal agencies meant that paychecks were not deposited into bank accounts on Friday as they usually are.

headline.main: Oops. 40,000 Federal Workers Miss a Payday.
headline.print_headline: Glitch Hits Thousands Expecting Federal Pay
